name: Bane of the Stricken
flavorText: After the defeat of Malthael, Diadra the Scholar wandered the world. She studied the gem cutters of Xiansai, and brought their secrets back to Westmarch. Bane of the Stricken is the first gem to come out of her Westmarch workshop.
flavorTextHtml: After the defeat of Malthael, Diadra the Scholar wandered the world. She studied the gem cutters of Xiansai, and brought their secrets back to Westmarch. Bane of the Stricken is the first gem to come out of her Westmarch workshop.

secondary.textHtml: Each attack you make against an enemy increases the damage it takes from your attacks by 0.80%. 0.80%
